content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) that puts items into the furnace
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) that takes items from the furnace

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel levels of entities to avoid interruptions in production.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to generate power.
- Verify that all entities requiring electricity are properly connected to the electric network.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items to transport.
- Regularly check the inventory of items to avoid delays in production.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network.
- Verify that all entities requiring electricity are properly connected to the electric network.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are filled with the required fluids.
- Regularly check the fluid levels in pipe groups to avoid interruptions in production.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the required ingredients for production.
- Regularly check the inventory of ingredients to avoid delays in production.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
